website_summaries.verdict: Fully height adjustable. Top pick for workers who alternate between standing and sitting.
pros: Can be adjusted so that platform is around 6 to 17 inches off the floor
cons: Some complain the top is covered with what feels like sandpaper, but it can be covered with a blanket

customer_reviews.title: I liked the quick adjustability because I switch between sitting and ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well for me for ~4 months. I liked the quick adjustability because I switch between sitting and standing throughout the day. However after 4 months of use, the welds on the base broke. ( It appeared that the base was only welded ~3/4 of the way around. Don't know if i got a defective one but at this price I wont take the chance of buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: bbben

customer_reviews.title: Great footrest with high stool/chair
customer_reviews.text: So far this works great. I have a height desk so I can stand but also have a high chair for when I want to sit. I was having shooting pain in my upper leg that I think was caused by sitting with my feet ina funny position. I have only been ising this for a week and don’t have that upper leg pain anymore. I will update this on the quality after I have had it longer but it seems very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Norman

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for me but...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after having minor foot surgery. I raised the footrest up to its highest position and turned it sideways to use as a legrest to keep my foot up. It worked perfectly and is very well built. My only complaint is the scratchy sandpaper covering. Now granted, I wasn't using this product as intended, so covering it with a piece of cardboard wasn't a big deal. But I did use it for a day or two as an actual footrest and it was really starting to tear up the bottoms of my shoes. A nice rubberized surface would make this footrest perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Got a very favorable response for the employee I bought ...
customer_reviews.text: Got a very favorable response for the employee I bought it for, yes, a little pricey but it was exactly what she needed and she was thrilled. I have been buying these for shorter employees that have a somewhat high work surface that I cannot lower. This particular foot rest is built to survive a nuclear winter and perhaps a zombie apocalypse (I can't verify that yet).
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Petroni

customer_reviews.title: Rugged and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I use it all day from my stool-type chair, and it's comfortable. It's rugged and holds its setting in the vertical holes very well. I had to put felt pads on the bottom to not scratch my hardwood floors, and now it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle E.

customer_reviews.title: I use this when I stand and sit at my desk
customer_reviews.text: I have a desk at work that is permanently in a standing poistion. so my chair is like a bar stool chair with a wonky ring on the center to rest my feet on.... which is very uncomfortable. This product solved my issue and is very easy to put together. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Todd S.

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it. It's a heavier footrest.
customer_reviews.text: I've used the plastic foot rests and they all are too lightweight and I usually end up kicking them around. I've debated building one out of 2x4's out of wood because they're heavy. But this is a great option and adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Steve JS

customer_reviews.title: good purchase
customer_reviews.text: While this is a bit heavy and industrial- it works perfectly for what I needed, fits under the kitchen table so my mother can elevate her feet, the height is adjustable so I can change depending how much edema she has and the non slip surface helps her keep her feet in place. The table has a pedestal base so the triangluar shape of the base works much better than most of the other bases out there that are rectangular, preventing them from being pushed far enough under the table for comfortable sitting and eating
customer_reviews.author: igj0045

customer_reviews.title: Poor Packaging with damage
customer_reviews.text: This is heavy metal appliance and would require better packaging. Some damage, but because I needed it immediately will not be returning.
customer_reviews.author: eBookGoddess

customer_reviews.title: Well, made, great option for tall chairs.
customer_reviews.text: I installed one of these in a shipping location. It's much better than other foot rests. The only down side is the chair legs hit the support bar on the floor. Looks like it will last a long time. We have now ordered 15 more in the adjusta-tilt style.
customer_reviews.author: Stroudz

customer_reviews.title: Sitting pretty.
customer_reviews.text: Much better than I expected! Sturdy and it really helps keep the swelling down and supports my lower back while doing it.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Best Footrest ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite foot rest for work! Easy to adjust and very comfortable and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: It does what it looks like it should do and appears sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It’s a sturdy foot rest for staff who sit on stools.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Nakai

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy. The surface is very rough sand paper like ...
customer_reviews.text: It is beneficial for those who need to raise their feet higher than the standard footrest. Very sturdy. The surface is very rough sand paper like material and using it with bare feet is out of the question. Surface will leave scratches on your shoes if any but the heels lay on it. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Bryant M.

customer_reviews.title: Little pricey but good
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, this seems way too expensive for such a simple product. If I was being financially responsible, I would have kept looking, but I was in a hurry. It is a 2 minute assembly and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Neutrino999

customer_reviews.title: Foot Rest
customer_reviews.text: Good Construction. Slides around on a hard wood floor. Had to put a rug under it. Dose not go low enough. Could use two more holes down low.
customer_reviews.author: Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for tall office chairs!
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the cost...this little gem has saved my back! I work in a tall, counter height chair and having my feet on the rung under the chair was putting a lot of pressure on my lower back...this took all that away! I can adjust it for whatever height my chair is. Very well made and super hefty...Love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for 👍
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what i needed...at a good price.....shipped fast.....smooth transaction...got no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: CJB

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that this is adjustable but could use more lower level heights. The anti-skid surface is way too rough on my shoes. I had to cover it with something to save wear and tear on my shoes. Great idea but needs tweaking. Too expensive for what it does.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Put your feet up and enjoy
customer_reviews.text: These are great, adjustable foot rests, and we purchased several. They work for people of most all sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony B

customer_reviews.title: A very sturdy product. I didn't like the rough surface
customer_reviews.text: A very sturdy product. I didn't like the rough surface, so I bought a large mouse pad to place on top ( It works great, the depth is perfect and the width has just an inch or two overhang.
customer_reviews.author: John Altobelli

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised but pricey.
customer_reviews.text: It works as advertised but I do have to say that $100 for a piece of iron is quite expensive. Unfortunately this is the only option out there.
customer_reviews.author: K family Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty product
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy duty product. No moving or slipping.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. Well designed, very comfortable, and it helped me heal my sore lower back. I didn't realize I needed foot support so much until a few weeks of putting my feet up while at my desk. Great product and well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: AWR

customer_reviews.title: Great footrest, wish I could put more weight on it
customer_reviews.text: This is almost exactly what I wanted. I wish it was a bit sturdier - I can't really put much weight on it or else it starts to bend rather alarmingly. But otherwise, I like the non-slip surface and the adjustable height, and it's well-constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan OGrady

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to put feet on at desk while sitting or standing.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and solid
customer_reviews.text: This footrest is large and sturdy. It'll support my size 14s with no problem. It's not the fanciest looking footrest you'll find. So the "industrial" moniker is correct. But it works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Tom K

customer_reviews.title: I have arthritis and this stand is very helpful in ...
customer_reviews.text: I have arthritis and this stand is very helpful in putting my legs up to keep the swelling. I use it in my office.
customer_reviews.author: Diva63

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: great strong product, very good price, fast shipping, employees very happy with the foot rest, they should last years and years, very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Robert O. shumate

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: So bulky that can't fit under a table, not using it.
customer_reviews.author: OS

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together and really sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased a lot of these for the office. Easy to put together and really sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Ksandy14

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: My boss uses this at his standing desk and likes the idea of being able to easily adjust the height.
customer_reviews.author: Irapcola

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for our Company needs. Almost all of my fellow work associates are using standup desks - these are perfect for when they are sitting - it adjust as needed per person.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Pfeifer

customer_reviews.title: Great for tech bench work stations.
customer_reviews.text: Great for tech bench work stations. I work in electronics manufacturing and we have test benches for our technicians who sit in drafting chairs. This is a nice product for good ergonomics to keep you comfortable during an 8 hour shift. Fully adjustable, stable, sturdy, and whoever is making $100 a pop off of this, bravo! Great design! It's worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: OC Birder Trish

customer_reviews.title: So easy to assemble and very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: So easy to assemble and very sturdy. This one is the second one I have purchased for co-workers and would order more if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like this very much.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my granddaughter who is scheduled to have foot surgery and will need to keep her foot elevated throughout the day. This product will certainly be helpful in doing that.
customer_reviews.author: dorothy Cheek

customer_reviews.title: It is over-priced. Stand is not stable - moves ...
customer_reviews.text: It is over-priced. Stand is not stable - moves backwards when I put my foot while sitting in a chair.
customer_reviews.author: Soori

customer_reviews.title: Great for Bar Height Workstations
customer_reviews.text: This footrest is perfect for bar height or adjustable height workstations. We have customer service stations and check-in desks that are bar height and the footrest adjusts to meet our staffs needs.
customer_reviews.author: nhbinrancho

customer_reviews.title: Investing in ergonomic comfort.
customer_reviews.text: Great adjustable height. Very easy to move around the office. Perfect for the sit/stand desk orientation. Well worth the investment!
customer_reviews.author: Jazzmin and Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Foot Rest....Very easy to change foot rest height and very comfortable....
customer_reviews.author: Mister E!

customer_reviews.title: great fit for a standup desk
customer_reviews.text: I have a standup desk at work with a barstool type chair. So this works great to support my feet vs the typical ring at the bottom of that chair. Like the fact that you can adjust the height.
customer_reviews.author: ratan d singh

customer_reviews.title: but it fits the need precisely and is adjustable & sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Pricey, but it fits the need precisely and is adjustable & sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Dale K.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The size is a bit big for my office. But back tension gone
customer_reviews.author: Safeya

customer_reviews.title: It' great
customer_reviews.text: The people in my office that have this footrest love it. They sit on chairs that are high and this was the best one we could find for the height of their chairs.
customer_reviews.author: BC55

product_meta.title: Safco Products Task Master Adjustable Footrest , 9 Positions, Tubular Steel Construction, Black
product_meta.description: Color:BlackSafco Task Master Adjustable Footrest may help relieve pressure points when standing or sitting for long periods of time. The textured, anti-slip platform mounts at an 8-degree angle and adjusts for individualized comfort. Heavy-gauge, black tubular steel construction provides stability and strength for long-lasting use. Footrest adjusts easily to nine positions with a height range of 5 1/2" to 15."
feature_bullets: STANDING FOOTREST. Safco Task Master Adjustable Footrest may help relieve pressure points when standing or sitting for long periods of time. The textured, anti-slip platform mounts at an 8-degree angle and adjusts for individualized comfort.
TUBULAR STEEL. Heavy-gauge, black tubular steel construction provides stability and strength for long-lasting use.
NINE POSITIONS. Footrest adjusts easily to nine positions with a height range of 5 1/2" to 15."
APPLICATIONS. Ideal for use in assembly operations, standing desks, cashier stations, front desk and other standing occupations.
PRODUCT DIMENSIONS. Finished dimensions: 20"W x 12"D x 15"H.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars77 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
